title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: VR-Based Physical Therapy Clinical Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Physical Therapy Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Using VR simulations, students perform patient status assessments and treatment planning with 80% or higher accuracy.
Students observe and analyze physical therapy professionals' decision-making processes three or more times in virtual clinical scenarios.
Based on VR learning experiences, students develop five or more clinical strategies applicable to real-world work environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
